org.apache.hadoop.util
Class LineReader

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.util.LineReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
LineRecordReader.LineReader
public class LineReader
extends java.lang.Object

A class that provides a line reader from an input stream.

Constructor Summary
LineReader(java.io.InputStream in)
          Create a line reader that reads from the given stream using the default buffer-size (64k).
LineReader(java.io.InputStream in, Configuration conf)
          Create a line reader that reads from the given stream using the io.file.buffer.size specified in the given Configuration.
LineReader(java.io.InputStream in, int bufferSize)
          Create a line reader that reads from the given stream using the given buffer-size.

          Close the underlying stream.
 int readLine(Text str)
          Read from the InputStream into the given Text.

          Read from the InputStream into the given Text.
 int readLine(Text str, int maxLineLength, int maxBytesToConsume)
          Read from the InputStream into the given Text.

readLine

public int readLine(Text str,
                    int maxLineLength,
                    int maxBytesToConsume)
             throws java.io.IOException
Read from the InputStream into the given Text.

Parameters:
str - the object to store the given line
maxLineLength - the maximum number of bytes to store into str.
maxBytesToConsume - the maximum number of bytes to consume in this call.
Returns:
the number of bytes read including the newline
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the underlying stream throws
